conbody.codeblock: !!! #{pageTitle} - My Site <link rel="stylesheet" href=@{Stylesheet} <body> <h1 .page-title>#{pageTitle} <p>Here is a list of your friends: $if null friends <p>Sorry, I lied, you don't have any friends. $else <ul> $forall friend <- friends <li>#{friendName friend} (#{show $ friendAge friend} years old) <footer>^{copyright}
